## VertexData.removeVertexBuffer() method

Removes a vertex buffer

**Signature:**

```typescript
removeVertexBuffer(buffer: StructuredBuffer): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  buffer | [StructuredBuffer](doc/markdown/./device.structuredbuffer.md) | Vertex buffer to be removed |

**Returns:**

boolean

true if the buffer was successfully removed, otherwise false
